      • getPercentiles

        public static <T extends Comparable<T>> List<T> getPercentiles(List<T> list,
                                               double[] percents)
        Calculates a list of percentile values for a given list of objects and percentiles.
        Parameters:
        list - The list of Comparable objects to calculate the percentiles of.
        percents - The array of percentiles (.01 to .99) to calculate.
        Returns:
        a list of comparables
